commandsListTooltip:
This bot was made for the Hypixel Translators Community by %%QkeleQ10%%. It's open source and our GitHub repository can be found [here]%%github%%.
You can help translate the bot by following the instructions in [this message]%%translate%%.

You can execute `+help <name of command>` to learn more about a specific command.
Below you can find a list of all the available pages. Use the reactions on this message to cycle through them.
madeBy: Bot made with lots of care by %%QkeleQ10%%
timeOut: This menu has timed out. If you wish to use it again, do `+help`.
noDesc:
This command is either in development or only available to staff.
Please contact a staff member if you believe this is an error.

help.description: Viser alle tilgjengelig kommandoer og annet info om boten.

prefix.description: Gir deg den riktige prefiksen for din(e) språk.

quote.description: Henter (eller legger til) et morsomt/rart/klokt sitat fra serveren.

mention.description: Nevner en språkrolle med en valgfri melding.

context.description: Gets, adds or edits context for the given string ID. `+context help` shows you information about this command. `+context link` gives you the link to request access to the context spreadsheet.

issue.description: Åpner vår GitHub issues-side, hvor du kan rapportere inn feil og sende tilbakemelding.

language.description: Endrer ditt språk, viser ditt nåværende eller viser en liste over alle tilgjengelige.

ping.description: Gives you the bot's ping as well as Discord API's ping.

invite.description: Gir deg en invitasjonslenke til serveren. Vær snill å bruk den når du vil invitere noen.

guidelines.description: Sender lenken til den offisielle tråden angående Hypixel-oversettelser.

thread.description: Sender lenken til tråden som annonserer denne Discord-serveren.

twitter.description: Sender lenken til den offisielle Hypixel Translators Community Twitter-siden.
